I like solving puzzles. Think this is pretty cool. After the first 30 mins, I had to refer to Youtube for a walkthrough. Haha. 

I dislike the portal-sickness. I did not expect to feel nausea whenever I get stuck. So I can't play this game for long. It's unexpectedly good for controlling appetite.
Great story, fun puzzles. Just replayed the main story again after pre-ordering when it came out. still one of my favorite games.
